h1: Hi, my name is Menhera Bot
p: I'm a bot with a focus on Fun and RPG. I'm 16 yo, and I love, like, I LOVE these faces a lot '>.<'. I exist to make your server a more fun environment to chat, cheering the people up with Gambling, the world of Boleham to explore, and of course there was no shortage of memes to make fun of. Add me on your server to cheer up with the brothers.
